participant_1.background: i'm terrified of scorpions. i'm employed by the us postal service. my favorite color is grey. my father drove a car for nascar. i've a german shepherd named barnaby.

participant_2.background: i also like to cook but i'm not very good at it. i have been trying all types of food everywhere i go. i have been traveling the world for a years. i own a yacht and i rent it out when i am not using it.

content.text: Hey! Are you terrified of scorpions? Because I am.
Hi there. No i'm not terridied of scorpions. How old are you?
I am 30, I have a friend who is a dog named Bart.
do your dogs like sports? I love soccer but my cats to not play.
I don't like competitive sports. i like to travel. i have been traveling the world for a years. Where are you from?
I live in California. I love to travel.
i also like to cook but i'm not very good at it. What is your favorite food?
I like to eat out and eat.
i have been trying all types of food everywhere i go. What is the last place you traveled to?
I love Mexican food. I love Mexican food.
i own a yacht and i rent it out when i am not using it. Do you want to join me in my next travel on a yacht?
I do not have a boat, but I do not have a boat
